resources.string: To launch logging benchmark\nsimply tap this red button >>>
To stop logging benchmark\nsimply tap the red button again
Test\'s basic string is currently empty
Zero iterations will make the total string empty
Total length of given string will be
Zero is set! (more loop iterations -> more precise results)
Numbers from 100 to 10.000 are usually enough
Each loop iteration ads a new copy of basic string\n to the tested mega-long string,\n which forms a burden for processing
Time expended on preparation for tests:
Results for logging the string on:
Press Back button again to exit
